replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

是运行内存不够嘛，还是？？

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
天下怪 发表于 2020-5-21 00:39
是运行内存不够嘛，还是？？
是你java分配内存太小了

可以顺便更新下你的java
https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe
